name: Paris
lyrics:
[ti:Paris]
[ar:The Chainsmokers]
[al:Paris]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Paris - The Chainsmokers
[00:04.51]Written by：Andrew Taggart/Kris Eriksson/Fredrik Häggstam
[00:09.03]We were staying in Paris (我们来到了巴黎)
[00:10.33]
[00:11.46]To get away from your parents (为了躲避你的父母)
[00:12.77]And I thought (我在想)
[00:13.47]Wow if I could take this in a shot right now (你我会不会很快就暴露了这个藏身之地)
[00:16.53]I don't think that we could work this out (也许待在这里并不是长久之计)
[00:18.90]Out on the terrace (站在阳台上)
[00:20.01]
[00:21.02]I don't know if it's fair (我不知道这样做是对还是错)
[00:22.47]But I thought how could I let you fall by yourself (但我知道我不该还在不爱我的人身上浪费时间)
[00:25.57]
[00:26.20]While I'm wasted with someone else (而让爱我的人一直苦苦单恋)
[00:28.24]
[00:28.87]If we go down then we go down together (如果被家人发现 我愿和你继续奔波辗转)
[00:33.37]They'll say you could do anything (别人说你无所不能)
[00:35.95]They'll say that I was clever (说我足智多谋)
[00:37.90]
[00:38.45]If we go down then we go down together (如果被家人发现 我愿和你继续奔波辗转)
[00:42.73]
[00:43.28]We'll get away with everything (我们总能够搞定一切 化险为夷)
[00:45.66]Let's show them we are better (就让他们看看 我们过得多好)
[00:47.61]
[00:50.56]Let's show them we are better (就让他们看看 我们过得多好)
[00:52.22]
[00:55.15]Let's show them we are better (就让他们看看 我们过得多好)
[00:57.23]We were staying in Paris (我们来到了巴黎)
[00:58.34]
[00:59.44]To get away from your parents (为躲避你的父母)
[01:00.98]You look so proud (你是那么的骄傲)
[01:02.16]Standing there with a frown and a cigarette (点上一支雪茄 皱着眉优雅地站着)
[01:04.56]Posting pictures of yourself on the internet (在网上发了几张自拍照)
[01:06.93]Out on the terrace (站在阳台上)
[01:08.10]
[01:09.33]We breathe in the air of this small town (呼吸着这个城市的空气)
[01:11.81]On our own cuttin' class for the thrill of it (掩饰不住的兴奋)
[01:14.42]Getting drunk on the past we were livin' in (沉醉于我们无法释怀的过往)
[01:16.74]If we go down then we go down together (如果被家人发现 我愿和你继续奔波辗转)
[01:21.23]
[01:21.76]They'll say you could do anything (别人说你无所不能)
[01:23.93]They'll say that I was clever (说我足智多谋)
[01:25.99]
[01:26.50]If we go down then we go down together (如果被家人发现 我愿和你继续奔波辗转)
[01:30.70]
[01:31.32]We'll get away with everything (我们总能够搞定一切 化险为夷)
[01:33.66]Let's show them we are better (就让他们看看 我们过得多好)
[01:35.54]
[01:36.16]Let's show them we are (就让他们看看 我们过得)
